channel.title: Player Owned shop? Still need help! I get nulls!
channel.description:
Hey guys, im making this shop, nothing to buy (regents and stuff) But players can sell to it, and buy stuff. It sounds simple but im struggling!!
Ive got it all write, you can see the shop and trade with it, but when i sell something, it says you can't sell to this shop!?
WTF!?
This is my shop.cfg file. [code] //--ShopID---ShopName--------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount shop = 65 Player Store 30 30 [/code]
I can now sell stuff to shop, when i sell noted stuff it's a null? Help Please

item.title: Player Owned shop? Still need help! I get nulls!
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

ill try another client
Well silabs crashes on startup, like try webber’s client.
Also crashes… Time to delete profile…

Also nulls… Oh well…

Ok, JC, how would i make it so you can only sell un-noted things to the shop? If you did try and sell noted stuff the this shop it says “You can’t sell noted items to this shop”

Cheers

Read full topic
item.source: Player Owned shop? Still need help! I get nulls!

item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

yay, i can now sell stuff! But when i sell noted items to the store (like a noted black longsword) it comes up as a null in the shop?

Read full topic

item.title: Player Owned shop? Still need help! I get nulls!
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Sell and buy should both be either ‘1’ or ‘2’.

Read full topic

item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

Hey guys, im making this shop, nothing to buy (regents and stuff) But players can sell to it, and buy stuff. It sounds simple but im struggling!!

Ive got it all write, you can see the shop and trade with it, but when i sell something, it says you can’t sell to this shop!?

WTF!?

This is my shop.cfg file.

//--ShopID---ShopName--------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount
shop = 65 Player Store				             30	   30

I can now sell stuff to shop, when i sell noted stuff it’s a null? Help Please
